import{createSlice,createAsyncThunk}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:5000/api/payments';const initialState={plans:[],userSubscription:null,orderId:null,paymentStatus:null,isError:false,isSuccess:false,isLoading:false,message:''};// Get subscription plans
export const getSubscriptionPlans=createAsyncThunk('subscription/getPlans',async(_,thunkAPI)=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`${API_URL}/plans`);return response.data;}catch(error){const message=error.response&&error.response.data&&error.response.data.msg||error.message||error.toString();return thunkAPI.rejectWithValue(message);}});// Create PayPal order
export const createPayPalOrder=createAsyncThunk('subscription/createOrder',async(planId,thunkAPI)=>{try{const token=thunkAPI.getState().auth.user.token;const config={headers:{'x-auth-token':token}};const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/create-order`,{planId},config);return response.data;}catch(error){const message=error.response&&error.response.data&&error.response.data.msg||error.message||error.toString();return thunkAPI.rejectWithValue(message);}});// Capture PayPal order
export const capturePayPalOrder=createAsyncThunk('subscription/captureOrder',async(orderId,thunkAPI)=>{try{const token=thunkAPI.getState().auth.user.token;const config={headers:{'x-auth-token':token}};const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/capture-order`,{orderId},config);return response.data;}catch(error){const message=error.response&&error.response.data&&error.response.data.msg||error.message||error.toString();return thunkAPI.rejectWithValue(message);}});// Get user subscription details
export const getUserSubscription=createAsyncThunk('subscription/getUserSubscription',async(_,thunkAPI)=>{try{const token=thunkAPI.getState().auth.user.token;const config={headers:{'x-auth-token':token}};const response=await axios.get(`${API_URL}/subscription`,config);return response.data;}catch(error){const message=error.response&&error.response.data&&error.response.data.msg||error.message||error.toString();return thunkAPI.rejectWithValue(message);}});export const subscriptionSlice=createSlice({name:'subscription',initialState,reducers:{reset:state=>{state.isLoading=false;state.isSuccess=false;state.isError=false;state.message='';},clearPaymentStatus:state=>{state.paymentStatus=null;state.orderId=null;}},extraReducers:builder=>{builder.addCase(getSubscriptionPlans.pending,state=>{state.isLoading=true;}).addCase(getSubscriptionPlans.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state.isLoading=false;state.isSuccess=true;state.plans=action.payload;}).addCase(getSubscriptionPlans.rejected,(state,action)=>{state.isLoading=false;state.isError=true;state.message=action.payload;}).addCase(createPayPalOrder.pending,state=>{state.isLoading=true;}).addCase(createPayPalOrder.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state.isLoading=false;state.isSuccess=true;state.orderId=action.payload.orderId;}).addCase(createPayPalOrder.rejected,(state,action)=>{state.isLoading=false;state.isError=true;state.message=action.payload;}).addCase(capturePayPalOrder.pending,state=>{state.isLoading=true;}).addCase(capturePayPalOrder.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state.isLoading=false;state.isSuccess=true;state.paymentStatus=action.payload.status;// Update subscription details after successful payment
if(action.payload.success){state.userSubscription={status:action.payload.planId,isActive:true};}}).addCase(capturePayPalOrder.rejected,(state,action)=>{state.isLoading=false;state.isError=true;state.message=action.payload;}).addCase(getUserSubscription.pending,state=>{state.isLoading=true;}).addCase(getUserSubscription.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state.isLoading=false;state.isSuccess=true;state.userSubscription=action.payload.subscription;}).addCase(getUserSubscription.rejected,(state,action)=>{state.isLoading=false;state.isError=true;state.message=action.payload;});}});export const{reset,clearPaymentStatus}=subscriptionSlice.actions;export default subscriptionSlice.reducer;
